title: Why hasn’t the government done nothing so far, and let this escalate to a death penalty?
selftext:
https://www.livemint.com/news/world/indian-nationals-sentenced-to-death-in-qatar-for-espionage-on-behalf-of-israel/amp-11698318334914.html 

No details given by Qatar or India, these ex-navy officers were arrested last year without any official charges. And now the death penalty !
I’m shocked to see this and the lack of support from the government towards ex-servicemen who have fought and served their country
comments:
They are not diplomats. They are civilians (ex-service men are civilians) working for a private defense company based in Oman are accused of spying charges.  Death penalty is legal in many countries, including India.

I dont think the Indian governments can do anything. It is the law of the country. I think foreign spies caught in India are also treated the same way,.
